title: Ship of Fools: How a Selfish Ruling Class Is Bringing America to the Brink of Revolution
description: The host of Fox News Channelâ€™s Tucker Carlson Tonight offers a blistering critique of the new American ruling class, the elites of both parties, who have taken over the ship of state, leaving the rest of us, the citizen-passengers, to wonder: How do we put the country back on course?
author: Tucker Carlson
